pages.text: $(thing)Cobblestone generators$() work on the principle that when a $(item)Lava$() stream comes into contact with $(item)Water$(), the $(item)Lava$() is turned into $(item)Cobblestone$(). $(br2)This fresh block then prevents the two streams from touching. $(br)When this fresh $(item)Cobblestone$() is removed, the two fluids produce another piece of $(item)Cobblestone$().
